column1: Art Institute of Chicago////A trip to Chicago can not be complete without visiting the famous Art Institute. This has become one of my favorite museums
column2: surpassing the Met in NY. I love the fact that it has a little bit of something for everyone
column3: from medieval artifacts to European paintings to Chinese porcelain to photography to contemporary art. While the place is huge
column4: it feels comfortable and manageable to spend an entire day here to check out most of the exhibits. Â
